text: ab kya tumane is par bhee gaur nahin kiya ki yaqeenan khuda hee ne aasamaan se paanee barasaaya phir ham (khuda) ne usake zarie se tarah-tarah kee rangaton ke phal paida kie aur pahaadon mein qataat (tukade raaste) hain jinake rang mukhataliph hai kuchh to saphed (burraaq) aur kuchh laal (laal) aur kuchh bilkul kaale siyaah
